AI Description: CNVnator is a tool designed for the detection of copy number variations (CNVs) and genotyping using whole-genome sequencing data. It is particularly useful in studying structural variations in the human genome.
Core Features: Detection Of Copy Number Variations (Cnvs), Genotyping, Utilizes Whole-Genome Sequencing Data, Identification Of Structural Variations In The Genome
General Tags: Cnv Detection, Whole-Genome Sequencing, Genotyping, Structural Variations
